section.para: To authorize specific Lot/Serial quantities and simplify the process for receiving Lot/Serial controlled Items on a Return Authorization, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When authorizing specific Lot/Serial quantities, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the Item Number specified for the Return Authorization Item. The Inventory Unit of Measure and Item description will automatically appear.
Select a pre-existing Lot/Serial Number for the Item. Or create a new Lot/Serial Number manually.
Enter the quantity of the specified Lot/Serial quantity you want to authorize.

note.para: The quantity authorized is based on the quantity Unit of Measure.

listitem.para: Displays the Lot/Serial quantity already registered. To learn more about Lot/Serial registration, see .
Displays the quantity received against the Return Authorization Line Item to date, if any.
